Package ohos.distributedhardware.devicemanager

Interface DeviceStateCallback


  • public interface DeviceStateCallback
    Provides callbacks that can be invoked when the state of a monitored device changes to online or offline.

    Before calling DeviceManager#registerDeviceStateCallback(String, Map, DeviceStateCallback) to register device state callbacks, you must first create a class to implement this interface and override the DeviceStateCallback#onDeviceOffline(DeviceInfo) and DeviceStateCallback#onDeviceOnline(DeviceInfo) methods.

    • When a monitored device goes online, DeviceStateCallback#onDeviceOnline(DeviceInfo) will be called to notify your application of the online device information.
    • When a monitored device goes offline, DeviceStateCallback#onDeviceOffline(DeviceInfo) will be called to notify your application of the offline device information.
    • If your application no longer needs to receive these notifications, you can call DeviceManager#unregisterDeviceStateCallback(String, DeviceStateCallback) to unregister all previously registered callbacks.
    Since:
    4
    See Also:
    DeviceManager.registerDeviceStateCallback(String, Map, DeviceStateCallback), DeviceManager.unregisterDeviceStateCallback(String, DeviceStateCallback)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onDeviceOffline​(DeviceInfo deviceInfo)
      Called when a device being monitored goes offline.
      void onDeviceOnline​(DeviceInfo deviceInfo)
      Called when a device being monitored goes online.

    • Method Detail

      • onDeviceOffline

        void onDeviceOffline​(DeviceInfo deviceInfo)
        Called when a device being monitored goes offline.

        If your application needs to be notified when a device goes offline, you must implement the DeviceStateCallback interface, override this callback, and then call DeviceManager#registerDeviceStateCallback(String, Map, DeviceStateCallback) to register the callback object. After being registered, this callback will be invoked when a device goes offline and your application will be notified of the offline device information.

        Parameters:
        deviceInfo - Indicates the offline device information. For details, see DeviceInfo.
        Since:
        4

      • onDeviceOnline

        void onDeviceOnline​(DeviceInfo deviceInfo)
        Called when a device being monitored goes online.

        If your application needs to be notified when a device goes online, you must implement the DeviceStateCallback interface, override this callback, and then call DeviceManager#registerDeviceStateCallback(String, Map, DeviceStateCallback) to register the callback object. After being registered, this callback will be invoked when a device goes online and your application will be notified of the online device information.

        Parameters:
        deviceInfo - Indicates the online device information. For details, see DeviceInfo.
        Since:
        4
